mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT homework.*, teacher.name as teacherName, course.cname as courseName , content.contentID as contentID FROM student JOIN sc ON student.id = sc.sno JOIN homework ON sc.cno = homework.cno JOIN teacher ON homework.tno = teacher.id JOIN course ON homework.cno = course.cno LEFT JOIN content ON homework.homeworkID = content.homeworkID AND content.cno = course.cno AND content.sno = student.id WHERE student.id = #{id} and course.cno = #{cno}
SELECT homework.* FROM teacher JOIN homework ON homework.tno = teacher.id JOIN course ON homework.cno = course.cno WHERE teacher.id = #{id} and course.cno = #{cno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sh (sno, homeworkId, cno,url) value (#{id},#{homeworkId},#{cno},#{url})
